entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
